类 VehicleGear

extends java.lang.Object
    List of enums for vehicle gears.

    • 字段详细资料

      • GEAR_UNKNOWN

        public static final int GEAR_UNKNOWN
        GEAR_* represents meaning of value for VehiclePropertyIds.GEAR_SELECTION and VehiclePropertyIds.CURRENT_GEAR. GEAR_PARK and GEAR_DRIVE only apply to the VehiclePropertyIds.GEAR_SELECTION property for a vehicle with an automatic transmission.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
